page.title: 14Religion in Maesbrook
page.content: Maesbrook Chapel. _________________ This chapel was built in 1899. Like the Parish Church, it has many plaques such as the following:- In Memory of Mrs. Ward's late husband Mr. Samual Ward. In Memory of Mrs. G. Sadler from Petton. The actual chapel is made up of two buildings,one of which is probably for Sunday School and meetings.This chapel also has a large variety of graves ranging from 1862-1983. The disused chapel (Enon Chapel.) Enon Chapel is an old building constructed in 1899.Outside on the wall is a plaque:- 1899,Enon Chapel "This is the lords doing,it is marvellous in our eyes."This chapel is now disused and contains a magnificant pedal organ made by Crane & Sons Ltd.
